title: CSV Insight Generator
description: An internal GE Appliances tool that allows users to upload any CSV file and receive an AI-generated guess describing the content and purpose of the data without requiring a predefined schema.

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Provide a single-page interface for CSV upload, processing, and displaying the AI-generated description.

interactions: User selects a CSV file → store in csvFile state.
User clicks 'Analyze' → set loading=true, clear previous results.
Papa Parse parses csvFile into csvData (header row auto‑detected).

If parsing succeeds, compose a prompt: "Given the following CSV data (first 20 rows), guess what this dataset is about and what business use case it might serve: <data>" and call await window.geaRuntimeLLM(prompt).
Store AI response in guessResult and display in the result card.
If parsing or AI call fails, set errorMessage and show SweetAlert2 toast.
Persist user theme preference using window.geaRuntimeStore.set('settings', {...}) and load on app start with window.geaRuntimeStore.get('settings').
acceptance_criteria: User can upload any .csv file up to 5 MB.
CSV is parsed without requiring a predefined schema; header row is detected automatically.
AI generates a concise (≤3 sentences) description of the dataset within 15 seconds of clicking 'Analyze'.
Loading indicator is shown while parsing or awaiting AI response.
Errors (invalid file, parse failure, AI timeout) are displayed via SweetAlert2 with clear messaging.
Result card displays the AI guess and a button to copy the text to clipboard.
All UI components are responsive and accessible (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation).
